snippet.title: Crowns and Pawns: Kingdom of Deceit | Nintendo Switch Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Crowns and Pawns: Kingdom of Deceit comes to Nintendo Switch on September 28th, 2023. Pre-order now on the Nintendo eShop.

Follow Milda and discover the secrets of your family in this charming point-and-click (or joystick-and-button-press?) mystery adventure. Armed with your wit, smartphone and puzzle solving skills you'll journey through modern day Europe to uncover the secrets of the king who was never crowned.

🛒 Pre-order today on the Nintendo eShop:
🇺🇸 https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/crowns-and-pawns-kingdom-of-deceit-switch/
🇪🇺 https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Crowns-and-Pawns-Kingdom-of-Deceit-2447585.html

👉 Follow Crowns and Pawns on social media and Discord:
Discord: https://discord.gg/P5qRm2b2UT
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CrownsAndPawns
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/CrownsAndPawns
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/crownsandpawns

_______________________________________________________________
